name: Mysteries of Mathower
description:
Game made for mini-jam 19, theme "Mysteries", with limitation "Game must combine two, or more different game genres".

Link to mini-jam : https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-19-mysteries

I have tried to mix quizz/educational math games with sort of dungon/A-RPG....

You have no weapon, you just have to avoid dying... Provide correct answers could help you to survive until the end.


Description :

"The Great Mathower has alwas been there, before the world itself.

Those who try to unveil the mystery of this tower perish or become insane..."

Controls :

+Arrow keys to move.

+Space to restart, escape to quit game.

+F12 to toggle Fullscreen.
